isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - POWER STEERING GEAR: SHEPPARD MODEL 292, 392, 492 - IDENTIFICATION

svcproc.title: Service Procedure
svcproc.para: A number is cast into the steering gear housing and identifies the basic family to which the steering gear belongs. 392-S would indicate a 392 short series steering gear. Refer to the Series 5 example below.

Stamped letters and numbers on an exposed machined surface of the housing opposite the mounting side identifies the gear specification; see gear P/N chart below. In the example, the complete identification is Model 392 SCU 4. 392-S cast number plus SCU 4 would refer to a short series 392 steering gear with series 4 revision level.
